categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope actors
Category:Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi actors

nodes.text: David Church is a British actor who had small parts in 1977's Star Wars and 1983's Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. In the former, he played a stormtrooper, and in the latter, a Rebel commando seen on Home One during the Death Star briefing scene. In 1999, the Endor Limited expansion set of the Star Wars Customizable Card Game consolidated said extra with the Expanded Universe character Lieutenant Page. Church later discovered that his Return of the Jedi character had been given a name during a signing at a Collectormania convention.
Church's later work included standing in for Warren Clarke on the BBC series Dalziel and Pascoe.
